data.prayer: Father, we ask for 265 new simple churches in the county of Navsari, Gujarat, India. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,329,700 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Navsari, Gujarat, India

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 14,627 believers in Navsari.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Navsari. Through your servants plant 265 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 14,627 believers in Navsari to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kasbati (Muslim traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, let those from the 14,627 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Navsari, Gujarat, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary:
the county of Navsari, Gujarat, India has a population of 1,329,700.

We estimate Navsari has 14,627 people who might know Jesus, 16,134 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,298,940 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 14,627 believers in Navsari against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

location.name: Navsari
